meanings: (수량·정도·체중 등이) (수량·정도 등이) grow, increase, rise, swell; (시간·기간 등이) be extended; (체중이) gain (weight)
(능력·실력 등이) (사물 주어) improve; (사람 주어) make progress, get better
People tend to become more nitpicky when they become older

vlive.korean: 겁이 더 느는 거야! I have more fear! 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] 아이유 분노의 시승식!
갈수록 느는 게 보일 거 아니에요? and how I improve with time, right? 듣기 View video ITZY : 오랜만에 유나V😎
vlive.english: and how I improve with time, right?

vlive.korean: [자꾸 사람도 늘고 행복도 느는 걸 보니] 뭐 하세요? [Look at this, there are more and more people and more and more joy] What are you doing? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [X1] 엑스원의 깜찍함과 원잇의 행복은 비례한다는 가설은 사실로 판명되었습니다❣️ (X1 eating spicy cup noodles)
vlive.english: [Look at this, there are more and more people and more and more joy] What are you doing?

vlive.korean: 근데 2주가 지나도 안 느는 거예요. But I didn't get better in two weeks. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Full]서른이지만 열일곱입니다 X 앞터V (30 but 17 X Early Interview)
vlive.english: But I didn't get better in two weeks.

vlive.korean: 좋아서 할 때 진짜 많이 느는 것 같아 그건 진짜 인정. I think you improve a lot when you do it because you like it. I admit that. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Two Kids Room(투키즈룸)] Ep.01 창빈X현진
vlive.english: I think you improve a lot when you do it because you like it. I admit that.

examples.korean: I think you're gaining weight. 발음듣기 네 몸무게가 느는 것 같구나. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I think you're gaining weight. 발음

examples.korean: I feel as though I'm spinning my wheels with English. 발음듣기 영어가 영 안 느는 것 같다 Neungyule
examples.english: I feel as though I'm spinning my wheels with English. 발음

examples.korean: That's about a hundred thousand better than last quarter. 발음듣기 그럼 지난 분기보다 한 10만 달러 느는 거네요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: That's about a hundred thousand better than last quarter. Is that because of ThermoTech? 발음듣기 그럼 지난 분기보다 한 10만 달러 느는 거네요. 그게 서모테크 덕분인가요? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: If you become depressed because of your appearance, weight gain is inevitable. 발음듣기 외모 때문에 침울해진다면 체중이 느는 것은 불가피합니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
